text:
@GregAbbott_TX NOT REPORTING👉🏻 “Nearly 5,000 meat industry workers had contracted COVID-19 and 20 had died on the eve of President Donald Trump’s executive order Tuesday that plants churning out America’s steaks and chicken fingers stay open through the pandemic.”
